long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with the latest medal counts and standings from the Paris Summer Olympics 2024 with our comprehensive Leaderboard/Medal Tracker. Whether you're a fan, journalist, or just curious, this extension provides you with all the essential information you need at a glance.

Features:
- Real-time Medal Standings: View the latest medal counts for each country, including the number of gold, silver, and bronze medals.
- Pinned Favorites: Pin your favorite countries to keep them at the top of the leaderboard for easy tracking.
- Collapsible Sections: Easily toggle the visibility of pinned favorites to keep your leaderboard organized and clutter-free.
- Discipline Details: Click on a country to see a breakdown of which sports they have won medals in.
- Persistent Favorites: Your pinned countries are saved, so you don't have to re-pin them each time you open the extension.
- Search and Filter: Quickly find specific countries or filter the leaderboard based on your preferences.

How to Use:
Open the extension to see the latest medal standings.
Click on a country's name to expand and view the sports in which they have won medals.
Pin your favorite countries by clicking the pin icon next to their name; this will keep them at the top of the list.
Collapse the pinned favorites section by clicking on the header to keep your view organized.
Use the search bar to quickly find countries or apply filters to narrow down the results.

Why You'll Love It:
Up-to-date: Always have the latest medal counts without having to search for updates.
Customizable: Tailor your view by pinning the countries you care about the most.
User-Friendly: Intuitive design with easy-to-use features ensures you get the information you need quickly and efficiently.
Efficient: The search and filter features make it easy to find specific information without scrolling through the entire list.

Keep track of the excitement and stay informed with the Paris Olympics 2024 Stats extension. Download now and never miss a moment of the action!
